get.description: Retrieves all MCMP API service and action definitions currently stored in the database.
get.summary: Get All Stored MCMP API Definitions

500.description: message: Failed to retrieve API definitions

post.description: Creates a new mapping between a permission and an API action

get.description: Returns all permissions mapped to a specific API action

put.description: Updates an existing mapping between a permission and an API action

delete.description: Deletes a mapping between a permission and an API action

get.description: Returns all platform actions mapped to a specific permission
get.summary: Get platform actions by permission ID

get.description: Returns all workspace actions mapped to a specific permission
get.summary: Get workspace actions by permission ID

post.description: Executes a defined MCMP API action with parameters structured in McmpApiCallRequest.
post.summary: Call an external MCMP API action (Structured Request)

200.description: External API Response (structure depends on the called API)

400.description: error: Invalid request body or parameters

404.description: error: Service or action not found

500.description: error: Internal server error or failed to call external API

post.description: Triggers the synchronization of MCMP API definitions from the configured YAML URL to the database.

200.description: message: Successfully triggered MCMP API sync

500.description: message: Failed to trigger MCMP API sync

get.description: Calls the GetAllNs action of the mc-infra-manager service via the CallApi service.

404.description: error: Service or Action Not Found

put.description: Updates specific fields (e.g., BaseURL, Auth info) of an MCMP API service definition identified by its name. Cannot update name or version.

200.description: message: Service updated successfully" // Or return updated service?

400.description: error: Invalid service name or request body

put.description: Sets the specified version of an MCMP API service as the active one.
put.summary: Set Active Version for a Service

400.description: error: Invalid service name or version

404.description: error: Service or version not found

500.description: error: Failed to set active version

모든 메뉴 목록을 트리 구조로 조회합니다. 관리자 권한이 필요합니다.
특정 플랫폼 역할에 매핑된 메뉴 목록을 조회합니다.
get.summary: 플랫폼 역할에 매핑된 메뉴 목록 조회

delete.description: 플랫폼 역할과 메뉴 간의 매핑을 삭제합니다.

400.description: error: platform role and menu ID are required

post.description: 요청 본문에 포함된 YAML 텍스트를 파싱하여 메뉴를 데이터베이스에 등록하거나 업데이트합니다. Content-Type은 text/plain, text/yaml, application/yaml 등을 권장합니다.
post.summary: 요청 본문의 YAML 내용으로 메뉴 등록/업데이트

parameters.example:
"menus:
  - id: new-item
    parentid: dashboard
    displayname: New Menu Item
    restype: menu
    isaction: false
    priority: 10
    menunumber: 9999"
parameters.description: Menu definitions in YAML format (must contain 'menus:' root key)
parameters.name: yaml

200.description: message: Successfully registered menus from request body

400.description: error: 잘못된 요청 본문 또는 YAML 형식 오류

post.description: filePath 쿼리 파라미터로 지정된 로컬 YAML 파일 또는 파라미터가 없을 경우 .env 파일의 MCWEBCONSOLE_MENUYAML URL에서 메뉴를 가져와 데이터베이스에 등록/업데이트합니다. URL에서 가져올 경우 asset/menu/menu.yaml에 저장됩니다.
post.summary: YAML 파일 또는 URL에서 메뉴 등록/업데이트

parameters.description: YAML 파일 경로 (선택 사항, 없으면 .env의 URL 또는 기본 로컬 경로 사용)
parameters.name: filePath

200.description: message: Successfully registered menus from YAML

requestParams.description: Parameters for the external API call

body.description: Request body (accept any JSON structure) - Changed from json.RawMessage for swag compatibility

pathParams.description: Parameters to replace in the resource path (e.g., {userId})

queryParams.description: Parameters to append as query string (?key=value)

children.description: Slice of pointers to child nodes

cspRoleArn.description: The actual ARN or identifier of the role in the CSP

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
BearerAuth.name: Authorization
